answers.answer: Idk how likely it is but my doc checked me early this time around. I did a 24 hour urine collection a few weeks ago and I'm four months also! If you don't mind me asking, why did you wait to go to the doc?
I waited because with my first daughter I kinda RUSHED , & they didn't really even do much . I didnt feel connected to my midwife & it was just a wreck . I hope this time is better . . .

question: If I've Had Preeclampsia in my first pregnancy how likely am I to have it with this pregnancy? I just scheduled my first appointment today & it's set for tomorrow @1Pm . What will they do? & What to expect? I hope I can get an ultrasound maybe .
title: Four Months & Just Now Making Appt.
